about_the_game:
Arcane Tower Survivors is a horde survival game where you face relentless waves of enemies in intense 20-minute sessions, with over 100 unique skills to help you fend off the onslaught. With a diverse selection of heroes and weapons at your disposal, craft the perfect build to suit your playstyle and overcome the challenges ahead.   

Between runs, delve into tower management. Build, customize, and upgrade your own mage tower to unlock passive bonuses and new abilities that will aid you in battles.

Features

  • Extensive Skill System: Discover and master over 100 character skills, allowing for limitless build combinations and strategies.

  • Diverse Heroes and Weapons: Choose from a wide array of heroes and weaponry, each offering unique abilities and playstyles to keep each run fresh and exciting.

  • Strategic Tower Management: Engage in a deep meta-game between battles. Build and upgrade your tower to gain passive bonuses, unlock new content, and strengthen your characters.

  • Fast-Paced Sessions: Experience intense action in 20-minute runs designed for quick yet satisfying gameplay sessions.

  • Progressive Enhancement: Benefit from a passive progression system where each run contributes to your overall power, encouraging continual growth and new tactical opportunities.

name: Arcane Tower Survivors
short_description: Survive waves of enemies in this horde survival roguelite. Unleash devastating spells, master unique skills, and craft unstoppable builds. Between battles, fortify your tower and unlock powerful upgrades in a strategic meta-game. Will your magic outlast the chaos?
